message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to someone in your position.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but $11,500 is below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I'm still a bit above your initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle of my previous offer and your current offer. How about $12,250?
